message: message Just speculations@Thando Nkutha Why debate rumours when you going to find out in 50mins sound?? sound please the sound has been captured Sound please S SABC is failing us GUYS OPEN ENCA and Pop out the chat there you could watch and keep up with the SABC live chat hmm

The ANC is full of people like Fuzile. Just that the system keep them at the backgroung and put some half baked people at the front So far Mr Fuzile is the type of servants SA needs

agree with you Bibby @Desmond Masilela CEO Standard bank Currently he is Chief Executive & Executive Director of SBSA... hands up Fuzile you are one of the people south africa needs in hard times It puzzles me why ANC keeps recycling and deploying old and crooked people where they have such talent... mxim Unfortunately Thando zuma was and is not competent in this type of matter he is just best in singing to whip gullible people emotion to blindly support him 🤣 @Thando 🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣 So was the state captured or not?
